name: Temple of Secrets
description:
You have heard rumors of a secret temple with a mysterious treasure hidden deep within. However, you can't get the treasure on your own. Work together with your team to solve puzzles, escape the temple, and get to the end. But you better move fast before time runs out!

When you join, you will be able to create or join a lobby with other people. Share the unique lobby code with your friends so you can play together!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to sprint
  • Z to interact

Want to see how this game was made? Check it out here
